Package org.openehr.base_base_types.identification

Interface LocatableRef

All Superinterfaces:
ObjectRef
public interface LocatableRef extends ObjectRef
Purpose Reference to a `LOCATABLE` instance inside the top-level content structure inside a `VERSION`; the path attribute is applied to the object that `VERSION._data_` points to.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    String
    asUri()
    A URI form of the reference, created by concatenating the following:
    UidBasedId
    getId()
    Globally unique id of an object, regardless of where it is stored.
    String
    getPath()
    The path to an instance in question, as an absolute path with respect to the object found at `VERSION._data_`.

    Methods inherited from interface org.openehr.base_base_types.identification.ObjectRef

    getNamespace, getType

  • Method Details

    • getPath

      String getPath()
      The path to an instance in question, as an absolute path with respect to the object found at `VERSION._data_`. An empty path means that the object referred to by id being specified.

    • getId

      UidBasedId getId()
      Globally unique id of an object, regardless of where it is stored.
